message: I just wanted to see if anyone's tried it or knows before I try it..

i made the cheese sauce with soy milk as i had some left, it worked out perfectly! i'm not sure if it would have been better/worse if i made it with my usual rice milk as i've only made it once so far. but the soy milk didn't do any odd things like curdle etc. it was a very rich and tasty sauce!
@nicolerinaldi  generally, yes. I use fat-free soymilk in the majority of my cooking and baking. However, if you're looking to froth it (like they do at starbucks) it's a hit or miss for me at home.
oh yay thanks guys :-) I'm jonsesing for pudding. i can't wait to try it
